p.codeblock: Future<void> setExternalAudioSink( {required bool enabled, required int sampleRate, required int channels});
public abstract int SetExternalAudioSink(bool enabled, int sampleRate, int channels);

section.p: After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, you can call to pull remote audio data. The app can process the pulled raw audio data before rendering to achieve the desired audio effect.

After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, you can call to pull remote audio data. The app can process the pulled raw audio data before rendering to achieve the desired audio effect.

After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, you can call to pull remote audio data. The app can process the pulled raw audio data before rendering to achieve the desired audio effect.

After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, you can call to pull remote audio data. The app can process the pulled raw audio data before rendering to achieve the desired audio effects.
section.note: After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, the app will no longer receive data from the callback.
After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, the app will no longer receive data from the callback.
After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, the app can no longer get data from the callback.
After calling this method to enable external audio rendering, the app will no longer receive data from the callback.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method is suitable for scenarios where you need to render audio yourself.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable external audio rendering:
: Enable external audio rendering.
: (Default) Disable external audio rendering.
The sample rate (Hz) for external audio rendering. Can be set to 16000, 32000, 44100, or 48000.

The number of channels for external audio rendering:
1: Mono
2: Stereo

Sets whether to enable external audio rendering:
: Enable external audio rendering.
: (Default) Disable external audio rendering.
The sample rate (Hz) for external audio rendering. Can be set to 16000, 32000, 44100, or 48000.

The number of channels for external audio rendering:
1: Mono
2: Stereo

: (Default) Disable external audio rendering.

1: Mono
2: Stereo

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
